description: a(n) = concatenation of next n numbers (omit leading 0's).
comments: Concatenation of the integers from A000124(n-1) up to and including A000217(n). - _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 30 2013
references: Felice Russo, A set of new Smarandache functions, sequences and conjectures in number theory, American Research Press 2000
maple: P:=proc(i) local a,k,j,n; for n from 1 by 1 to i do a:=n^2/2+n/2+sum('(n^2/2+n/2-k)*10^sum('floor(1+evalf(log10(n^2/2+n/2-j)))','j'=0..k-1)','k'=1..n-1); print(a); od; end: P(100); [From _Paolo P. Lava_, Dec 16 2008]
author: _Felice Russo_, Feb 25 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Feb 28 2000
